=== Distributed Content Development ===
A platform for <nowiki>[[DistributedContentDevelopment|distributed content development]]</nowiki> is in dire need. Most developers are not artists and the challenge of content creation is much more difficult than code. Lack of good content (images, graphics, textures, models, sounds, voices, etc) is the #1 impediment for FOSS games.

=== Ubuntu Clan ===
Join the '''<nowiki>[[Clan|Ubuntu Clan]]</nowiki>''' advocacy effort to play '''cross-platform''' FOSS games with an Ubuntu tag to promote it to other gamers.
